definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: This study demonstrated A. pseudoalhagi extract has no significant side effects on rats.
sentences.chinese: 本研究證明駱駝刺提取物對大鼠無明顯毒副作用。

sentences.english: What side effect does long-term drop eyedrop have?
sentences.chinese: 長期的滴眼藥水有什麼副作用啊？

sentences.english: Stick isotropy to treat a scar what to side effect there is?
sentences.chinese: 貼同位素治療傷疤有什麼副作用？

sentences.english: The ill-balanced payment system may have a lot of side effect.
sentences.chinese: 這個不平衡的工資系統將產生許多副作用。

sentences.english: Common side effects from these drugs include muscle pain and soreness.
sentences.chinese: 這些藥物常見的副作用包括肌肉疼痛和痠痛。

sentences.english: There were no serious side effects from minocycline.
sentences.chinese: 二甲胺四環素並沒有嚴重的副作用。

sentences.english: Infliximab and its side-effect profile are discussed, along with other associated complications.
sentences.chinese: 針對英利昔單抗的副作用和相關併發症進行了闡述。

sentences.english: Which, as a side-effect, makes heterogeneity a non-issue.
sentences.chinese: 所以，作爲副作用，異構也不再是一個問題了。

sentences.english: It's all in those side effects I mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 其實都在那些我提到的副作用當中。

sentences.english: Radix Sophorae Tonkinensis also has a certain toxic side-effects.
sentences.chinese: 此外山豆根還存在一定的毒副作用。

sentences.english: This could be prevented or minimized by rectifying vitamin D levels.
sentences.chinese: 而調整維生素D含量可以減少或抑制這種副作用。

sentences.english: Does old people stop with agent of mist of Yunnan Baiyao gas what side effect does arthralgia have?
sentences.chinese: 老年人用雲南白藥氣霧劑止關節痛有什麼副作用？

sentences.english: This is a fast-acting, totally safe product with no side effects at all.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個快速起作用，完全安全的產品，沒有副作用。

sentences.english: Preventing and detecting adverse effects from medicines is termed pharmacovigilance.
sentences.chinese: 預防和發現藥物副作用被稱爲藥物警戒。

sentences.english: No serious complication was found, with less side-effect.
sentences.chinese: 副作用少，無嚴重併發症。

sentences.english: There were no reports of side effects associated with natalizumab therapy.
sentences.chinese: 目前的檢驗報告沒有發現那他珠單抗療法有副作用。

definition: every medicine has its side effect
